DOC.criteria: Key Diagnosis OA knee , base American College Rheumatology ( ACR ) criterion , confirm Xray ( KL Grade II/III within last year ) . At least moderate severe pain due OA one knee . On nonsteroidal antiinflammatory drug ( NSAID ) 28 day previous study start willing continue NSAID throughout study . Discontinuation opioids prior study start . Additional criterion exist . Key Current recent infection last 7 day ; infection require hospitalization parenteral antibiotic within last 6 month ; history currently active tuberculosis , hepatitis B C , human immunodeficiency virus ( HIV ) . Surgery index knee within previous 6 month . Trauma surgery within previous 8 week . Specific abnormal laboratory value electrocardiogram abnormality . Gastrointestinal surgery may interfere motility absorption . On nonstable dose bisphosphonates , prior denosumab parathyroid hormone ( PTH ) therapy . Prior parenteral tumor necrosis factor ( TNF ) inhibitor antinerve growth factor ( NGF ) therapy . Intramuscular , intravenous oral corticosteroid within previous 6 week . Intraarticular corticosteroid index knee within previous 8 week viscosupplementation index knee within previous 4 month . Currently enrol participate another clinical trial within previous 3 month . Additional criterion exist .
